articles.author: Chris Marquette
articles.title: State Department halts employment visas for truck drivers - Politico
articles.description: The action comes amid investigations into a deadly Florida crash involving a driver from India.
articles.content: The driver failed the English Language Proficiency assessment, getting two of 12 verbal questions correct and accurately identifying 1 of 4 highway signs during an on-site compliance investigation by… [+1512 chars]
